result.arabic_text: لَّقَدۡ أَضَلَّنِي عَنِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ جَآءَنِيۗ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ خَذُولٗا
result.translation: He led me astray from the Reminder[14] after it had come to me.” Satan always betrays man[15].
result.footnotes: [14] i.e., the Qur’an or Allah’s remembrance. [15] Forsakes him after leading him into evil.
